name: Blackfeather
flavorText: This cloak matches the description of the one worn by the hero in the popular children's tale Yorgie and the Giants.
flavorTextHtml: This cloak matches the description of the one worn by the hero in the popular children's tale Yorgie and the Giants.

secondary.textHtml: Dodging or getting hit by a ranged attack automatically shoots a homing rocket back at the attacker for 667% weapon damage as Physical. (Demon Hunter Only) [600 - 800]%
